00018 #ifndef CO_PAIRCONNECTION_H
00019 #define CO_PAIRCONNECTION_H
00020 
00021 #include "connection.h"
00022 
00023 namespace co
00024 {
00029     class PairConnection : public Connection
00030     {
00031     public:
00032         CO_API PairConnection( ConnectionPtr readConnection,
00033                                   ConnectionPtr writeConnection );
00034 
00035         CO_API ConnectionPtr getSibling();
00036 
00037         CO_API virtual bool connect();
00038         CO_API virtual void close();
00039 
00040         virtual Notifier getNotifier() const
00041             { return _readConnection->getNotifier(); }
00042 
00043     protected:
00044         CO_API virtual ~PairConnection();
00045 
00046         virtual void readNB( void* buffer, const uint64_t bytes )
00047             { _readConnection->readNB( buffer, bytes ); }
00048         virtual int64_t readSync( void* buffer, const uint64_t bytes,
00049                                   const bool block )
00050             { return _readConnection->readSync( buffer, bytes, block ); }
00051         virtual int64_t write( const void* buffer, const uint64_t bytes )
00052             { return _writeConnection->write( buffer, bytes ); }
00053 
00054     private:
00055         PairConnection( PairConnection* sibling );
00056 
00057         ConnectionPtr _readConnection;
00058         ConnectionPtr _writeConnection;
00059         co::base::RefPtr<PairConnection> _sibling;
00060     };
00061 }
00062 #endif //CO_PAIRCONNECTION_H
